The reminder

The list of reminders

member.summary: Gets all the sounds from the database and fills the combobox with them.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of popup

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.PlaceDayCheckBoxesPanel
member.summary: Adds the DayCheckBoxes panel between the layout and adjusts the location of the note textbox, and the buttons below it.

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.PlaceComboboxMonthlyWeekly
member.summary: Adds the monthly combobox between the layout and adjusts the location of the note textbox, and the buttons below it.

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.RemoveComboboxMonthlyWeekly
member.summary: Hides the week/monthly combobox between the layout and resets the location of the textbox and the buttons below it

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.FillControlsForEdit(Database.Entity.Reminder)
member.summary: Fills the controls of creating a new reminder with the data from the reminder

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.ShowOrHideExclamation
member.summary: Determines wether the exlamation sign should be visible or not, with an tooltip saying the entered date is invalid

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.pbCloseApplication_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Closes RemindMe to the system tray. RemindMe can be terminated through it's icon in the tray

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.GetCommaSeperatedDayCheckboxesString
member.summary: gets all the checked day comboboxes and puts them into a string. example: monday,tuesday,friday

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.SetDateTimePickerMonthlyValue
member.summary: Sets the value to the DateTimePicker "dtpDate" after the user adds days to the monthly reminder

member.name: M:RemindMe.Form1.GetDatesStringFromMonthlyDaysComboBox
member.summary: Goes through all the integer days in the combobox(1,3,25),makes dates from them and puts them into a string.
